content: **crochet bag with colored pattern and tassels worked in the round from the middle of the bottom of the bag and upwards the piece is worked in drops paris ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no w-717 yarn group c or a + a ----------------------------------------------------------- measurements circumference 48 cm / 19 height 28 cm / 11 materials drops paris from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 100 g color 17 off white 100 g color 38 raspberry 50 g color 37 rusty red the piece can also be crocheted with yarn from alternative yarn yarn group c see link below drops crochet hook size 3 mm / c or the size needed to get 20 double crochets and 11 row on 10 cm / 4 in width and 10 cm / 4 in height
